infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.robotpower: You ran out of power and your battery is irreversibly damaged.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.robotpower.low: Your battery is charged enough to fully run your systems.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rinternalda: You have succumbed to your internal water damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rinternaldamage.lo: Minor sparks spring out from your chest.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rinternaldamage: Many internal components are heavily damaged!.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.robotinfection: Your voicebox is not responding, you feel vines entagling your joints.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.scoutdodge: Remaining energy allows for a quick sideways dodge.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mediccharge: Remaining energy to activate special ability.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.transform: Transforms vanilla damage type into robot specific ones.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.racidburn: Process terminated, frame and internal components have melted from exposure to acidic chemcials.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.racidburn.low: Frame has sustained a small degree of acid corrosion. Dotted spots of dissolved metal can be found if one inspects throughly.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.racidburn: Frame is enduring moderate acid corrosion. Structural integrity has begun to fail with the outer frame being stripped away. Internal components at risk of exposure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.racidburn.high: Frame is suffering from significant acid corrosion. Structural integrity is compromised and internal components are completely exposed.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rbitewounds: Process terminated, frame was bitten into and has been irreparably damaged.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rbitewounds.low: Frame has sustained minor bite punctures. Little to no damage done to internal circuts.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rbitewounds: Frame is enduring multiple bite punctures causing various internal components to be masticated.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rbitewounds.high: Frame is suffering from excessive bite punctures, compromising and damaging internal circuits.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rblunttraum: Process terminated, frame could not withstand excessive or extreme force.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rblunttrauma.low: Frame has resisted minor physical trauma but has acquired some negligible bumps and dents.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rblunttrauma: Frame withstood moderate physical trauma and should be repaired before integrity is compromised. Movement impaired.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rblunttrauma.high: Frame integrity compromised by severe physical trauma. Movement hindered.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rburn: Process terminated, frame and internal components have melted from excessive heat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rburn.low: Frame singed by external heat. Both external and internal parts remain intact, if a little darker that usual.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rburn: Frame seared by high external heat. External joints are red hot and wearing down quickly, impairing movement. Internal components suffering under excessive heat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rburn.high: Frame scorched by extreme external heat. External joints are struggling to move as the metal distorts. Internal components are in a critical state.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rexplosiond: Process terminated, frame and internal components were blown to bits.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rexplosiondamage.l: Frame resisted minor sharpnel projectiles but some internal circuits were rattled due to sudden kinetic force. Repairs recommended.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rexplosiondamage: Frame sustained moderate sharpnel damage with some sharpnel embedding into internal circuits. Seek repairs immediately.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rexplosiondamage.h: Frame is suffering major sharpnel damage and internal circuits are in a critical state. Seek repairs immediately.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rgunshotwou: Process terminated, frame and internal components shot full of holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rgunshotwound.low: Frame partially resisted firearm rounds. A few bullets remain stuck on the frame.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rgunshotwound: Frame has sustained moderate firearm damage causing internal components to be exposed. Some internal circuits were shot.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rgunshotwound.high: Frame is suffering from excessive firearm damage. Many internal components were shot causing electrical discharge.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rinternalda: Process terminated, internal components were irreparably damaged.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rinternaldamage1.l: Internal systems have sustained minor damage on essential components. Some errors and glitches may occur.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rinternaldamage1: Internal systems are suffering serious damage on essential components. Overall system operations are failing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rinternaldamage1.h: Internal systems are in critical state due to excessive damage. Total system failure imminent.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.rlaceration: Process terminated, frame was ripped open completely and is irreparably damaged.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rlacerations.low: Frame has taken minor damage with slight tears in it but nothing has been exposed yet.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rlacerations: Frame has taken moderate damage and has multiple tears in it, exposing internal components.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rlacerations.high: Frame has taken major damage and is almost completely ripped open. Make repairs immediately.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rdamageresistance: Additional armor plating to protect the frame.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rwaterproof: Improved circuitry and water cycling to prevent water damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rempresistance: Rubber insulation to dampen sudden electromagnetic pulses.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rmovespeed: Optimized motors for higher speed travel.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rswimspeed: Optimized animation data to increase swimming speeds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rskillcaptain: Firmware for navigating submarines and faster turret charging.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rskillmedic: Several medical textbooks worth of data causing more efficent usage of medical supplies.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rskillsecurity: Targeting systems and faster turret firing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rskillmechanic: A bookshelfs worth of technical manuals
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rskillengineer: A bookshelfs worth of engineering and wiring manuals
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rdronepod: Information on how to synthesize combat drones within the users primary chassis.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rmicrobots: Repairs in response to physical trauma
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rnanomachines: They harden in response to physical trauma
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rbayonet: Construction data for an arm-mounted blade.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rhusk: You feel as if you could brave any depth, but you struggle to activate your voice box as its subsumed by the Rot.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rdronecyst: You feel cysts bursting out of your back.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.immolatorbuff: The system has been overloaded, causing components to overheat. Performance is reduced until it cools down or is repaired.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.immolatorheat: The internal temperature of the unit has risen to a dangerous level. Overheating or damage to components may occur.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.dronedecay: The unit's components gradually wear out, leading to reduced operational efficiency.
infotexts.entitydescription.frame1: A frail and lightweight frame that can handle pressure up to 3000 meters. A cheap option great for a rookie crew, but upgrades will be mandatory for missions deeper in Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.frame2: A strong frame thats capable of withstanding pressure up to 4000 meters. A direct upgrade built upon the Exo-Frame MK. 1, it should handle dangers more adequately.
infotexts.entitydescription.frame2safe: An Exo-Frame that combines the capabilities of both the Exo-Frame MK. II and the Safety harness. It can handle depths up to 4000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.medicframe: A sturdy Exo-Frame capable of withstanding pressures up to 7000 meters. Equipped with deep pockets for medicine storage and produces gasses that passively heal your human teammates around you.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cframe1: A strong frame. Offers a good amount protection and can withstand pressure up to 6000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.scoutframe: A strong and lightweight frame designed for deep sea battle. Offers a good amount protection and combat firmware with the added ability of a recharging shield. It can withstand pressure up to 6000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cframe2: A large and heavy exo-frame designed for deep sea battle that is powered by fuel rods. Heavily armoured and can withstand pressure up to 10,000 meters. Its heavy frame allows to lessen the recoil from heavy firearms
infotexts.entitydescription.v1frame: A prototype Exo-Frame made with a thin plating that repairs itself on contact with blood. It provided reinforcements up to 10,000 met- EARTH IS SILENT. BLOOD IS FUEL. EUROPA IS FULL.
infotexts.entitydescription.mechframe: An exo-frame with a built in hull monitor and a nailgun which can repair hulls and damage enemies. Perfect for keeping the sub leak-free while having a self defense option when Europan creatures inevitably raid your ballasts. it can withstand pressure up to 8,000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.engineerframe: An exo-frame with a built in electric monitor and a special overcharging system. Overcharge speeds up yourself and robots around you, and can be discharged in a static blast. it can withstand pressure up to 7,000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cframe3: An agile exo-frame designed to glide through the water armed with an grappling harpoon. It can handle pressure up to 7000 meters. Its streamlined design sacrifices ground movement for fast speeds underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.cargoframe: A large exo-frame designed to hold cargo crates while still allowing the user to move quickly. It can handle pressure up to a depth of 8000 meters. A built-in flashlight slot allows the user to glow and produce a large amount of light.
infotexts.entitydescription.captainframe: A stylish frame capable of depths up to 10,000 meters. Direct your crew with dignity and grace with a wireless connection to your command room, allowing you to pilot your sub no matter the location. This new model even comes with built in thermal vision.
infotexts.entitydescription.immolatorframe: An improvised frame which blueprints were made by the sepratists. It can support depths of 8000 meters. Using the Scorcher builds up lethal heat which can be cleansed for a powerful buff.
infotexts.entitydescription.MFrame: Robust outer frame designed for mining materials, equipped with a battery-powered drill. Provides pressure protection up to 6,000 meters
infotexts.talentdescription.rtcraftwithlessitems: You can craft ‖color:gui.orange‖FPGA Circuits‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Circuit Boxes‖end‖ with much fewer materials. Unlocks recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Robot Charging Dock‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.rivetgun: Drag out of hand to remove
infotexts.entitydescription.navtablet: Drag out of hand to remove
infotexts.entitydescription.sailharpoongun: Drag out of hand to remove
infotexts.entitydescription.immolatorflamer: Drag out of hand to remove
infotexts.entitydescription.disposablebattery: A very wasteful solution to the robotic energy crisis.
infotexts.researchstation.research.robotinfo: Encrypted drive detected. Contents unknown. Are you sure you want to proceed?
infotexts.researchstation.combine.robotmissingitem: Encrypted drive detected. Burner FPGA circuit required.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.SwimingSpeedModule: Installed a module that accelerates movement in the water
infotexts.afflictiondescription.WalkSpeedModuleBuf: A module is installed that speeds up travel on land
infotexts.afflictiondescription.AIlearning: You have been disconnected for a long time and because of this your database is out of date. You got -15 to all skills, but since you are a machine you learn 30% faster
infotexts.afflictiondescription.RobotWeightingDevi: Installed a device that increases the weight of the robot, which subsequently makes it more resistant to water flows by 30%, 25% damage, but also makes it slower by 10%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.NanorobotsBuff: Nanorobots that revitalize the body, but during administration puts the host to sleep for the duration of the treatment.
infotexts.entitydescription.RobotWeightingDevice: A device that increases the weight of the robot, which subsequently makes it more resistant to water flows by 30%, damage by 25%, but also makes it slower by 10%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rmolochdata: Synthesized genetic data of a Moloch. Subject's plating patterns now mimic that of a moloch's physiology, increasing defense.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rmolluscdata: Synthesized genetic data of a Mollusc. The subject experiences less pain and the chassis can handle injuries smoother.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rskitterdata: Synthesized genetic data of a Skitter. Upon receiving damage, subject's mobility systems temporarily overclock.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rhunterdata: Synthesized genetic data of a Hunter. Despite hunters no longer being common in europa, the drive alters your fight/flight response to temporarily overclock offensive systems when damage is sustained.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rthermaldata: Genetic fragments allow for faster reactions and heat resistance. Perfect for fighting in high-temperature conditions.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rfractaldata: Alien code decrypted with an advanced algorithm. Utilizes various properties of fractal guardian animation data and code to enhance the subject's own.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rsailormemory: A collection of tips and tricks learned from an old sailor's past experiences. A readme file says: 'Take care, kid.' It makes you wonder whether or not you should even have this.
infotexts.entitydescription.NanorobotsWeapon: Automatic nanorobot insertion device(ANIS) is designed for rapid insertion of nanorobots for accelerated healing/repair of organics and synthetics. Due to technological peculiarities of the device only robots can use it, as well as it takes most of the energy from the user. WARNING!!! When organic creatures use this tool, their bodies will inevitably be scorched from the inside out, which can be fatal.
infotexts.entitydescription.NanorobotsBullet: A capsule with nanorobots contains many nanorobots that regenerate living organics/synthetics, after which they self-destruct due to lack of energy without harming the organism. For their introduction you need a special device: the Automatic Nanorobot Introducer (ANIS) - designed for use by robots.
infotexts.entitydescription.piercerWeapon: Energy weapon that does not need ammo, but takes some of the user's energy, so it can only be used by robots WARNING!!! Organic will be scorched from the inside out when attempting to draw energy
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdrive1: Port allowing robots to install geneticists and custom software. Mounts directly to the processor skull.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdrive2: Port allowing robots to install geneticists and custom software. Mounts directly to the processor skull.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdrive3: Port allowing robots to install geneticists and custom software. Mounts directly to the processor skull.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdrive4: Port allowing robots to install geneticists and custom software. Mounts directly to the processor skull.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdrive5: Port allowing robots to install geneticists and custom software. Mounts directly to the processor skull.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdrive6: Port allowing robots to install geneticists and custom software. Mounts directly to the processor skull.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdresist: Basic firmware package. Enables default synthesis port functionality and standard operational protocols.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipwaterproof: Basic firmware package. Enables default synthesis port functionality and standard operational protocols.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipempresist: Basic firmware package. Enables default synthesis port functionality and standard operational protocols.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipmovespeed: Basic firmware package. Enables default synthesis port functionality and standard operational protocols.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipswingspeed: Basic firmware package. Enables default synthesis port functionality and standard operational protocols.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipswimspeed: Basic firmware package. Enables default synthesis port functionality and standard operational protocols.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdronepod: A purpose-built chip developed for highly specific robotic tasks. Its internal routines are tailored for enhanced efficiency in niche operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipbayonet: A purpose-built chip developed for highly specific robotic tasks. Its internal routines are tailored for enhanced efficiency in niche operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipmicrobots: A purpose-built chip developed for highly specific robotic tasks. Its internal routines are tailored for enhanced efficiency in niche operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipscythe: An infected chip containing corrupted or malicious data. It can cause unpredictable changes in the behavior of an entity.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipdronecyst: An infected chip containing corrupted or malicious data. It can cause unpredictable changes in the behavior of an entity.
infotexts.entitydescription.chiphusk: An infected chip containing corrupted or malicious data. It can cause unpredictable changes in the behavior of an entity.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipnanomachines: An infected chip containing corrupted or malicious data. It can cause unpredictable changes in the behavior of an entity.
infotexts.entitydescription.encrypteddisk: A data packet encoded with an unknown algorithm. To access its contents, special decryption is required.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipcaptain: The main module responsible for managing the unit's operating system. Contains core routines that enable port functionality and support installed modules.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipmedic: The main module responsible for managing the unit's operating system. Contains core routines that enable port functionality and support installed modules.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipsecurity: The main module responsible for managing the unit's operating system. Contains core routines that enable port functionality and support installed modules.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipmechanic: The main module responsible for managing the unit's operating system. Contains core routines that enable port functionality and support installed modules.
infotexts.entitydescription.chipengineer: The main module responsible for managing the unit's operating system. Contains core routines that enable port functionality and support installed modules.
infotexts.eventtext.shop.katee.interact: Welcome to the Europan Robotics Foundation outlet! How may this unit assist you today?
infotexts.eventtext.shop.katee.achievement: Congratulations customer! You have shown your loyalty by purchasing every item in this outlet! Please enjoy a complemtary Cosmetic Frame Blueprint!
infotexts.talentdescription.dunce: You had one job. Try engaging with the mods mechanics, knucklehead. Unlocks [itemname]
infotexts.talentdescription.valuedcustomer: KAT-E Thanks you for your patronage! Unlocks [itemname]
infotexts.talentdescription.highlytrainedprofessio: Wield a crowbar while looking like an orange ice-pop. Unlocks [itemname]
